alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 20 at 2:02PM MDT until May 21 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures around 30 expected. * WHERE...Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
